content.alt: Coalition members grouped together with some members raising their fists in the air
content.heading: Become a Member
content.paragraph: Be a part of financially supporting the Coalitionâ€™s grassroots movement to ensure the cannabis industry is equitable for all.

content.columnOne:
# A Member-Supported Movement
Monthly and annual donations help us continue the work of cannabis justice that includes record clearing programming, increasing opportunities for Black and Brown business ownership, fighting for investment in our communities through policy change, and advocating for Community Benefits Agreements for cannabis businesses.
content.columnTwo:
## Sample Heading


This field accepts markdown. You can do **bold** and *italic*.


Add a line in between to get a new pararaph. [Links](https://www.thesquirrelcensus.com/) can also be added.

content.columnOne:
## Grassroots Supporter  
**$4.20/month or $50/annually**

- Individual membership

- Curated member newsletter with playlists, infused recipes, interviews, and more

- Exclusive member sessions with Movement and Medicine

content.columnOne:
## Equity Champion 
**$15/month or $120/annually**

- Individual membership
- Access to exclusive events co-hosted by Coalition equity partners
- Discounts on Coalition merch and events
- Curated member newsletter with playlists, infused recipes, interviews, and more
- Exclusive member sessions with Movement and Medicine

content.columnOne:
## Entrepreneur  
**$250/annually**

Corporate Membership includes Equity Champion Tier items, plus:
- Community Benefits Agreement consultation support
- Visibility of Brand at Coalition events
- Coalition-led Workshops for your staff
- Access to exclusive events co-hosted by Coalition equity partners
- And more!
